name: Tutorial 6 First Macro
definition:
You are in front of a <<USERNAME.table.tutorial-1-colours>> house, upon the door is knocker
inset with a large <<USERNAME.table.tutorial-2-gems>>.
There are ((2d6)) windows scattered across the frontage.
From within a voice can be heard reciting numbers - "<<USERNAME.table.tutorial-3-generating-numbers>>"
